meanings.definition: The state or status of being a megastar.
meanings.sent1: Her megastardoms brought joy to millions of fans.
meanings.sent2: In Hollywood, achieving megastardoms requires talent and hard work.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, his megastardoms costume stole the show.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline glittered with megastardoms like shining beacons.
meanings.sent5: The aura of her megastardoms lit up the room with excitement.

meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being extremely famous or successful in the entertainment industry.
meanings.sent1: Their megastardoms in music led to sold-out concerts worldwide.
meanings.sent2: Achieving megastardoms in acting often requires versatility and dedication.
meanings.sent3: The cat's megastardoms in the viral video made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The megastardoms of the author's books shone brightly in the literary world.
meanings.sent5: His megastardoms on the basketball court inspired young athletes everywhere.
